definition: of or relating to the most highly developed stage of an earlier civilisation and its culture, a creation of the highest excellence
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the most highly developed stage of an earlier civilisation and its culture
= example: of or relating to the most highly developed stage of an earlier civilisation and its culture
= synonyms: classical
- of or pertaining to or characteristic of the ancient Greek and Roman cultures
= example: of or pertaining to or characteristic of the ancient Greek and Roman cultures
= synonyms: classical
- of recognized authority or excellence
= synonyms: classical
noun
- a creation of the highest excellence
- an artist who has created classic works
